params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select `messages`.`message`, `messages`.`id`, `messages`.`created_at`, `users`.`first_name`, `users`.`last_name`, `users`.`profile_pic`, `users`.`id` as `user_id` from `messages` left join `team_conversations` on `messages`.`id` = `team_conversations`.`message_id` left join `users` on `users`.`id` = `team_conversations`.`user_id` where `team_conversations`.`team_channel_id` = 'y$IUy0MDUL9VPeijrqpJe8v.9xXT4TjjGUUzcndckGQ3R09rHNjrJxe' order by `messages`.`id` desc limit 10
